remarks: Any two (different) vertices in a friendship graph have a unique common neighbor.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Dec-2017.)
statement:
frgraun $p |- ( V FriendGrph E -> ( ( A e. V /\ C e. V /\ A =/= C ) -> E! b e. V ( { A , b } e. ran E /\ { b , C } e. ran E ) ) ) $.
$d A b $.
$d C b $.
$d E b $.
$d V b $.
